Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'In darkness and silence, you return once more to the familiar quantum sea, immersed in a peaceful yet somber dream.'}
{3: 'Surging memories rush in to wake you... You hear static as the past and present merge into one.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory627.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory627.jpg'}
{3: 'In the endless cycles, what possibility are you searching for?'}
{3: 'A sea of corruption, a blackened sky, your formless existence, and this endlessly repeating world...'}
{3: "Your consciousness refuses to linger here any longer. You will ignite yourself and paint the sea's surface with ashen flames."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory615.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory615.jpg'}
{3: 'In the flickering flames of karma, a white portal fades in and out, as if silently echoing the answer in your heart.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'As you open your weary eyes, the portal opens before you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory523.jpg'}
{3: 'This path leads to yet another parallel universe—where your final journey shall unfold.'}
{3: 'You remember standing here with Jetavie countless times before. Having defeated the Image of Desire—your archenemy—the two of you were here waiting for time to reset...'}
{3: 'Now, you are no longer part of the scene but an<color=#ff0e0e>observer</color>, silently watching this timeline unfold.'}
{3: "You hear a woman's voice—gentle, calm, and enchanting. She speaks quietly of her desires..."}
{3: 'Her veiled malice flows by your ears like water, leaving you intoxicated and helpless.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Be it lamb, wolf, or cheetah...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Beings that make the survival of their species their ultimate goal will inevitably fall into degradation once they lose their natural predators.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'They crumble beyond salvation from within and become pawns cast aside by God.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Awakening is both a duty and a price to be paid.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You see, I cherish you as my own, which is why I hope you become the Chosen One more than anyone else.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Bringing in that virus and trapping you in this endless cycle—are all proofs of my love.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Perhaps, one day, you will rise above all other possibilities through this surging malice.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Just like 3278 cycles ago when you devoured the Chosen One's computing power...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You look just as adorable as you point your gun at me now.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You must never stop fighting, Jetavie.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "I'm going to finish you here and now, Higher Authority!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The view shifts to reveal a silver-haired girl standing amid piles of butchered monsters. She stands defiant with her battered body. Her icy glare shows only a ruthless thirst for blood.'}
{3: 'Jetavie is every bit as innocent and cheerful as you remember her...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory101.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHuiyisha01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'My name is Jetavie. Our meeting here is not by chance.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory523.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHuiyisha01.prefab'}
{3: 'On a second look, while she looks the same, her presence is entirely different. This girl is more mature, like a battle-hardened avenger. Her unkempt silver hair flows wild, and...'}
{3: 'The weapon in her hand looks like something between a gun and a cannon.'}
{3: 'You suddenly realize—in this universe, Jetavie has lost the Chosen One.'}
{3: 'As for why... maybe somewhere along the way, their shared desire to live has faded...'}
{3: 'They promised to find freedom together, but was "together" ever truly possible?'}
{3: 'If only one of them could escape, then staying here might be the only way for them to remain together.'}
{3: 'The thought "I want to stay together,"" inevitably turned into ""I don\'t want to leave."'}
{3: 'Doubts gradually eroded their judgment, and their growing comfort with the status quo hindered their quest for freedom.'}
{3: 'And the one who first realized this and broke their unspoken agreement was likely your counterpart in this timeline...'}
{3: "The Chosen One willingly sacrificed themselves to sever their bond and rekindle Jetavie's resolve to escape the matrix."}
{3: "That gun in Jetavie's hand must have been crafted from the Chosen One's remaining computing power."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Kill me? I dare you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'Enough talking. As long as I am still alive...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Jetavie tightens her grip on the trigger as new enemies burst out from the ground around her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'A horde of monsters materializes from scattered data and lunges at Jetavie.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'Darn it. Now of all time, huh...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie has no choice but to reposition her weapon, turning its barrel away from Higher Authority and toward the approaching monsters.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryRedSmokeNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryRedSmokeNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: "Crimson light erupts and carves a clean hole through a monster's body."}
{3: 'But more monsters come charging in, wave after wave.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Jetavie swings her weapon violently, unleashing rays in all directions in a desperate fight.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'When is it going to end...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie strikes down her final enemy as her weapon reaches its limit.'}
{1: '[WARNING! WEAPON ENERGY AT 1%]', 3: '60', 4: 'e60000'}
{3: '[WARNING! WEAPON ENERGY AT 1%]'}
{3: "Mangled remains scatter at Jetavie's feet."}
{3: 'When Jetavie raises her gun at Higher Authority once more...'}
{1: '[INSUFFICIENT POWER]', 3: '60', 4: 'e60000'}
{3: '[INSUFFICIENT POWER]'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "I never thought it'd be possible for you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie lowers her gun.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "You've grown much stronger after absorbing the Chosen One's remaining computing power.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "But it's far from enough. How much computing power could you really gain from a shattered soul?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A hint of melancholy creeps into her voice.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'Shut up! Give the Chosen One back to me!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Give the Chosen One back to you? How can I give them back when you're the one who devoured the Chosen One.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'A destroyed body can be rebuilt in another cycle of reincarnation, but once the computing power that forms the soul is lost...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "I'm afraid there's nothing I can do.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Do you want me to extract the Chosen One's computing power from your body like a surgeon?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "But you two were always meant to be one entity. To put it bluntly, you're simply more complete now than you were before.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "Stop making assumptions! You don't know anything about us!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Whining at me like a lovesick teenager is going to get you nowhere.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "You're always the last one standing when everyone else is gone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'You appear in every cycle, just like me and the Chosen One... No, you are an existence that transcends even us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'This is why I am Higher Authority. Is that hard to comprehend?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "You're my true enemy. Defeating you will give me all the answers I seek.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Do you think the truth will just reveal itself if you defeat me? But what if the truth is a poison?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "I don't care. The truth is all I seek.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Are you sure you're not just deluding yourself, Jetavie?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'How did you feel when the Chosen One entrusted their computing power to you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Pain? Moved? Pity? Or did you blame yourself for being powerless?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "If I were you, I'd probably be overjoyed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Finally reclaiming what should have been yours, finally ridding yourself of that useless burden...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Now that you've inherited their projection abilities, you don't have to rely on anyone else in a fight, right?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "Shut up! How dare you insult the Chosen One! If it weren't for you—!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "If it weren't for you... we'd never have been dragged into this twisted cycle you call a game, and the Chosen One would still have been alive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "I know you're the one behind everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "You're neither one of us, nor a monster born from the Red Tide.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'Who exactly are you?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Who am I?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory526.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Maybe I'm a pink-haired girl in platform shoes.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory376.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Maybe I'm a man sitting in a dark corner after losing his prosthetic limb.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory374.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Maybe I'm a blind witch sheltering others beneath a tree.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory362.png'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Maybe I'm Sheriff Robert, who upholds justice and fights evil."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory523.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'If you wish, I could be anyone you want. Even this "me" you see now is but an illusion.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'No matter who you are, no matter how many cycles it takes, I will catch you and make you pay.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Don't hate me, Jetavie. Why glare at me with such fury over a worthless Job?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Besides, you're running out of time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'This world, too, will soon end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Like a bubble fated for doom.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Enough chitchat.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dark patches, like curtains, appear at the edge of the horizon.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'The dark patches spread in all directions as the claws of the void begin to devour the world whole.'}
{3: "Under the collapsing heavens, Jetavie charges toward Higher Authority's vanishing figure."}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'Give me back... the Chosen One!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Still blind to the truth.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Higher Authority snaps her fingers with casual grace.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hordes of monsters surge forth from the murky ground, swarming and holding down Jetavie.'}
{3: "The hideous enemies desperately press on Jetavie's head and drag her into a sea of debris and wreckage."}
{3: 'Jetavie is quickly buried beneath the debris. Only her fingertip can be seen on the surface.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory647.jpg', 3: '0.6', 4: '0.6', 5: '0'}
{3: 'On the other side, the void drowns the world in a grey-white whirlpool, making it as fragile as a tower about to collapse.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Higher Authority suddenly freezes in her tracks.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3201_09.jpg'}
{3: 'Higher Authority turns her gaze toward you, despite your intangible existence.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory523.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{3: 'Terror strikes your soul in that instant. You feel a hand choking you—although the hand seems to have no physical form.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory523.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'I see...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Higher Authority has a small change of mind.'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'If this is one possibility... this would truly be a delightful coincidence.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As Higher Authority turns around, the monsters around Jetavie instantly crumble to ashes.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '3'}
{3: 'Jetavie collapses to the ground covered in wounds, yet her willpower drives her to prop herself up once more.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon23.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon23.png', 4: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "I've changed my mind, Jetavie.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Cracks of darkness appear behind Higher Authority like a spiderweb, and from it a pale blue bow and arrow emerge.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'What do you want now...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'I shall grant you access to a higher level of authority.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Power you've never had before—a gift powerful enough to change everything.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon22.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon22.png', 4: '5'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: '—The power to turn back time itself.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon23.png', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon22.png', 4: '5', 5: '1'}
{3: "The blue arrow suddenly shoots out from the crack, piercing straight through Jetavie's body."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{3: 'Jetavie lets out an agonized scream as pale blue markings begin to creep across her body and face.'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'Ahh! Curse you, woman! What have you done to me?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: '...Is my internal processing power expanding at an incredible speed?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "Why are you helping me? Aren't we enemies...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Use this power wisely.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'The possibility you seek exists neither in this moment nor in this place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'The answer does exist—if that resolution is what you seek...', 4: '1'}
{3: "There's a faint trace of sorrow in the way Higher Authority looks."}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'I shall wait for you at the <color=#ff0e0e>beginning</color> of your journey.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon23.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon23.png', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon23.png', 3: '0', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{3: 'With these words, Higher Authority vanishes into the unknown through the mysterious void crack.'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'Left without so much as a goodbye.', 4: '2'}
{1: '[Protocol Upgrade in Progress, Acquiring Authorization...]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[Protocol Upgrade in Progress, Acquiring Authorization...]', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'This power from Higher Authority... what exactly is it?', 4: '2'}
{1: '[Data Reconstruction Complete... Initiate World Restructuring?]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[Data Reconstruction Complete... Initiate World Restructuring?]', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As Jetavie surveys her surroundings, the colors of the world ebb away like receding tides.'}
{3: 'A raging void storm sweeps through every corner, leaving Jetavie alone in the eye of the tempest.'}
{3: 'The surging computational power within Jetavie is driving her to make a choice.'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "The enemy's power? How absurd! But what choice do I have...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "The Chosen One, I will try once more—even if this is a trap, even if this power isn't truly mine...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'Even if nothing remains here, for your sake, I will revive time itself from death.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'Let time halt at this very moment, and everything that has passed flows backward...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory523.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'Time... has come to a halt...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The apocalypse freezes at this moment—the storm ceases, and even the light filtering through the ashen sky comes to a standstill.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '[Rollback Protocol Ready, Constructing Multi-Branch Simulation Data...]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[Rollback Protocol Ready, Constructing Multi-Branch Simulation Data...]'}
{1: '[Unpacking External Protocol, Location Confirmed...]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[Unpacking External Protocol, Location Confirmed...]'}
{1: '[Training Loop #10458, Locked]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[Training Loop #10458, Locked]'}
{1: '[Multiple Variables Destabilizing... Threat Assessment... <color=#ff0e0e>Level S</color>]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '[Multiple Variables Destabilizing... Threat Assessment... Level S]'}
{3: '[Forced Execution...]'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: "I'll keep rewinding, no matter how long it takes, and return to the past.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'I will hold your hand once more...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'This time, I will never let you go.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'This is my answer.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory523.jpg'}
{3: 'The lost time begins to flow backward.'}
{3: 'As the gray sky regains its colors, the void slowly loosens its grip on the world.'}
{3: 'The wind flows against the two of you. The clouds sail to the far horizon.'}
{3: 'Splattered dirt returns to Earth while withered blooms awaken once more.'}
{3: 'Stirring with the flowers is the ancient Red Tide—and the monsters it bred within.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Image of Desire', 3: 'Was it you who awakened me?', 4: '4'}
{2: 'Image of Desire', 3: 'Did power awaken from the time that is dead...', 4: '4'}
{2: 'Image of Desire', 3: 'The cost is equally apparent... Is your decision final?', 4: '4'}
{2: 'Image of Desire', 3: "I'll be waiting nearby, my dear.", 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '4'}
{3: 'As their archenemy departs, monsters awaken one after another from the Red Tide and head toward the distant unknown.'}
{3: 'As time resets, this world known as Beta brims with an ethereal vitality.'}
{3: 'No one knows how this repeating cycle of cause and effect will end.'}
{3: 'Time is accelerating the entropic increase... causing withered bubbles to swell once more.'}
{3: "All the wounds on Jetavie's body vanish, and her weapon is fully loaded once again."}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
